price: (4) Then return [your] vision twice again.[1713] [Your] vision will return to you humbled while it is fatigued.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: thumma ir'jiʿi al-baṣara karratayni yanqalib ilayka al-baṣaru khāsi-an wahuwa ḥasīrun
